custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT FragmentComposition.fragmentCompositionId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM FragmentComposition WHERE (FragmentComposition.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentComposition.fragmentCollectionId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$])

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT FragmentComposition.fragmentCompositionId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM FragmentComposition WHERE (FragmentComposition.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentComposition.fragmentCollectionId = ?) AND (FragmentComposition.name LIKE ?) AND ([$STATUS$])
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT FragmentEntry.fragmentEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM FragmentEntry WHERE (FragmentEntry.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntry.fragmentCollectionId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$])

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT FragmentEntry.fragmentEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM FragmentEntry WHERE (FragmentEntry.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntry.fragmentCollectionId = ?) AND (FragmentEntry.name LIKE ?) AND ([$STATUS$])

SELECT DISTINCT FragmentComposition.fragmentCompositionId AS fragmentCompositionId, 0 AS fragmentEntryId, FragmentComposition.createDate AS createDate, FragmentComposition.name AS name FROM FragmentComposition WHERE (FragmentComposition.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentComposition.fragmentCollectionId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$])

SELECT DISTINCT FragmentComposition.fragmentCompositionId AS fragmentCompositionId, 0 AS fragmentEntryId, FragmentComposition.createDate AS createDate, FragmentComposition.name AS name FROM FragmentComposition WHERE (FragmentComposition.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentComposition.fragmentCollectionId = ?) AND (FragmentComposition.name LIKE ?) AND ([$STATUS$])

SELECT DISTINCT 0 AS fragmentCompositionId, FragmentEntry.fragmentEntryId AS fragmentEntryId, FragmentEntry.createDate AS createDate, FragmentEntry.name AS name FROM FragmentEntry WHERE (FragmentEntry.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntry.fragmentCollectionId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$])

SELECT DISTINCT 0 AS fragmentCompositionId, FragmentEntry.fragmentEntryId AS fragmentEntryId, FragmentEntry.createDate AS createDate, FragmentEntry.name AS name FROM FragmentEntry WHERE (FragmentEntry.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntry.fragmentCollectionId = ?) AND (FragmentEntry.name LIKE ?) AND ([$STATUS$])

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CONCAT(CAST_TEXT(FragmentEntryLink.classNameId), '-', CAST_TEXT(FragmentEntryLink.classPK))) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM FragmentEntryLink WHERE (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = ?)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT FragmentEntryLink.classPK) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM FragmentEntryLink INNER JOIN Layout ON (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = Layout.groupId) AND (FragmentEntryLink.classPK = Layout.plid) WHERE (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.classNameId = ?)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT FragmentEntryLink.classPK) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM FragmentEntryLink INNER JOIN LayoutPageTemplateEntry ON (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = LayoutPageTemplateEntry.groupId) AND (FragmentEntryLink.classPK = LayoutPageTemplateEntry.layoutPageTemplateEntryId) WHERE (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.classNameId = ?) AND (LayoutPageTemplateEntry.type_ = ?)

SELECT FragmentEntryLink.* FROM FragmentEntryLink WHERE (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = ?) AND ( FragmentEntryLink.createDate = ( SELECT MAX(tempFragmentEntryLink.createDate) FROM FragmentEntryLink tempFragmentEntryLink WHERE (tempFragmentEntryLink.groupId = FragmentEntryLink.groupId) AND (tempFragmentEntryLink.classPK = FragmentEntryLink.classPK) AND (tempFragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId) ) )

SELECT FragmentEntryLink.* FROM Layout INNER JOIN FragmentEntryLink ON (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = Layout.groupId) AND (FragmentEntryLink.classPK = Layout.plid) WHERE (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.classNameId = ?) AND ( FragmentEntryLink.createDate = ( SELECT MAX(tempFragmentEntryLink.createDate) FROM FragmentEntryLink tempFragmentEntryLink WHERE (tempFragmentEntryLink.groupId = FragmentEntryLink.groupId) AND (tempFragmentEntryLink.classPK = FragmentEntryLink.classPK) AND (tempFragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId) ) )

SELECT FragmentEntryLink.* FROM LayoutPageTemplateEntry INNER JOIN FragmentEntryLink ON (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = LayoutPageTemplateEntry.groupId) AND (FragmentEntryLink.classPK = LayoutPageTemplateEntry.layoutPageTemplateEntryId) WHERE (FragmentEntryLink.groupId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = ?) AND (FragmentEntryLink.classNameId = ?) AND (LayoutPageTemplateEntry.type_ = ?) AND ( FragmentEntryLink.createDate = ( SELECT MAX(tempFragmentEntryLink.createDate) FROM FragmentEntryLink tempFragmentEntryLink WHERE (tempFragmentEntryLink.groupId = FragmentEntryLink.groupId) AND (tempFragmentEntryLink.classPK = FragmentEntryLink.classPK) AND (tempFragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId = FragmentEntryLink.fragmentEntryId) ) )
